data: Respondents who a) worked for pay in the week prior to the interview, b) had a job or business in the week prior to the interview, but were temporarily absent, c) had seasonal or contract work for at least a few days in the past 12 months, or d) worked at a job or business but not for pay for at least a few days in the past 12 months were asked how many days during the past 12 months they missed because of illness, injury, or disability.

caption: Percentage of six or more workdays missed due to illness, injury, or disability in the past 12 months for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
